mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT(stu_id, stu_name, stu_password, stu_auth_level, stu_sex, stu_class_id) VALUES(#{stuId}, #{stuName}, #{stuPassword}, #{stuAuthLevel}, #{stuSex}, #{stuClassId})
mapper.select: SELECT stu_id, stu_name, stu_password, stu_auth_level, stu_sex, stu_class_id FROM STUDENT WHERE stu_id = #{value}
